Statement.Title: Disclaimer
Statement.Description: Octoparse is a web scraping tool. By using Octoparse, you agree that your use of the tool, technologies and application are solely in conjunction with the extraction of data from publicly accessible websites (including sites which may require a user login). In all cases where copyrighted and or confidential data may be included as part or all of the extracted data, you agree to comply with all copyright laws and rules covering such data including (but not limited to) the reproduction and resale of such data. You agree that Octoparse will not be held responsible for legal liabilities incurred through the use or misuse of data obtained through using Octoparse.

LocalRunner.CollectErrorTipsText: Display error message during local extraction process
LocalRunner.LoadImageText: Do not load images during local runs.
LocalRunner.LocalRunnerTips1: 1. Disabling image loading can generally reduce the time it takes to load a web page, which can speed up the extraction. However, some web pages won’t load correctly without having the image loaded. Please use with caution.
LocalRunner.LocalRunnerTips2: 2. Do not disable image loading if CAPTCHA solving is required.
LocalRunner.LocalRunnerTips3: 3. This setting is only effective for once.
LocalRunner.NoUseProxy: IP proxy has not been used.
LocalRunner.AcquisitionError: Run error. Data has not been extracted correctly for one or more pages. Please check error report.

CustomTask.ProcessTabDescription: 八爪鱼是模拟人的操作方式（如打开网页、点击网页中的某个按钮等）对网页数据进行全自动提取。流程中的每个步骤可以看作每个对网页的操作， 点击流程步骤可执行该步骤，可逐个执行流程步骤观察网页和预览数据变化来验证采集设置是否正确，可以对每个步骤的设置进行修改。

CustomTask.ConfigureIdentifyFailure: 请配置「识别失败」的场景！
CustomTask.MayInconsistentWith:
在实际采集过程中，验证码的识别结果，有0.1%的可能与实际的验证码不符，这将导致数据采集失败；
当前八爪鱼无法自动判断出这种情况，所以现在需要你来教导八爪鱼，什么是「识别失败」的场景（只需要教导一次，八爪鱼以后即可自动判断并处理这种情况），接下来八爪鱼将自动输入一个错误的验证码并提交，请点击“确认”。
CustomTask.ConfirmErrorMessage: 请确认页面错误提示信息
CustomTask.ErrorMessageAppears:
当页面出现该错误信息时，八爪鱼会认为此次验证码识别错误，将自动重新识别，直到错误信息不再出现。
请确认该错误提示

OptionName.SatisfyCarriedOut: Perform the action when any of the below conditions are met
OptionName.CloseSpecifiedElement: Action will be performed after the specified wait time even if the designated element is still missing.

CheckboxName.LoadFailRetry: Auto-retry when page fails to load.
CheckboxName.ScrollAfterCompleteLoad: Scroll down the page when page is loaded.
CheckboxName.ClearCacheBeforeOpenWebpage: Clear cache before loading the web page.
CheckboxName.RetryAndChangeBrowser: Rotate user agent (browser) when page reloads.
CheckboxName.RetryAfterNoChange: Reload when page remains unchanged (use discretely for AJAX loading).
CheckboxName.PositionAnchorAfterLoadPage: Locate an anchor when page is loaded.
CheckboxName.UseTextInLoopAsInputValue: Use text in the loop to enter the text box.
CheckboxName.DropDownToCurrentLoop: Use dropdown options in the loop

SelectOption.ScrollToBottom: to the bottom of the page

RadioName.CurrentIncludeText: Execute if the page contains specific text
RadioName.CurrentIncludeTextInLoop: Execute if the current loop contains specific text
RadioName.CurrentIncludeElement: Execute if the current page contains specific element
RadioName.CurrentIncludeElementInLoop: Execute if the current loop contains specific element
RadioName.CatchElementOuterHtml: Outer HTML (include source code, text with format and image).
RadioName.CatchElementInnerHtml: Inner HTML (include source code, text with format and image).
RadioName.ExtractMultipleRowsFromSameField: (Default) Capture data from the same field into different rows when extracted multiple times.
RadioName.ExtractOneRowFromSameField: Colmergate data captured for the same data field into a single row. For example, combine content captured from multiple pages.

Tooltip.ProvideGoodProxyIp: 八爪鱼提供优质代理IP服务，可用性极高，防屏蔽效果优良
Tooltip.UseRandomForgeryIp: 对于一些防采集技术水平不高的网站，可以通过随机伪造IP功能进行突破；副作用，伪造的IP来自全国各地，部分网站可能根据不同IP显示不同地区的页面内容，启用此项将会导致采集规则失效；您需要针对目标网站，进行充分实验后再决定是否启用此功能；
Tooltip.CloseRetryInCollectSlow: 有些情况下Ajax点击后网页内容无变化，此时会激活‘自动重试’功能而导致采集进程缓慢，这种情况请关闭‘自动重试’。Sometimes, web page has no change when AJAX is checked, "Auto Retry” will be activated and it will slow down the extraction. Please uncheck "Auto Retry".
Tooltip.SupportNumberLetter: 支持八位内的纯字母、纯数字，数字与字母混合验证码识别费用为0.05元/每个
Tooltip.OnlySupportSlideCapacha: 目前仅支持极验滑动验证码自动识别，使用前请购买验证码余额
Tooltip.LoopCollectTips: If a task is split-table in the cloud, this option is applied for each sub-task.
Tooltip.GetPageCookieTips: Cookie is loaded from current web page

Button.GetPageCookie: Use cookie from the current page

Setting.EditTaskGourpNameFail: Network error. Failed to edit group name.
Setting.SetDefaultTaskGroupFail: Failed to set default task group.
Setting.OneProxyPerLine: Enter proxies here. Separate each IP proxy by colon(:).
Setting.TaskMayBeSplitInto: A task can be split into several sub-tasks and be run on various cloud servers for faster extraction depending on the task workflow. There are times, however, when task split should be disabled. For example, some websites only allow for one login at a time. In this case, having multiple servers working on the same task (logining at the same time) would not help getting more data but may adversely affect all jobs. Note that "Disable task split" is not available for tasks with a large number of URLs - these tasks will be split.
Setting.generallyNotLoadImages: 1. Usually disable image loading would save the time of page loading and accelerate the extraction. 2. In some cases it may cause page loading error or affect extraction progress. Please use it cautiously. 3. This option cannot be selected if you need to enter CAPTCHA in the extraction.
Setting.AutomaticallyBlock: Ad blocking accelerates page loading speed and reduce unnecessary HTTP requests, thus accelerate extraction progress and reduce the computer memory and other hardware resources consumption. However, ad blocking may not identify all ads, or it may misjudge and block non-ads. Please use it cautiously.
Setting.OctopusSimulationBrowser: Octoparse simulates different browsers(User Agent) to access websites. Websites could be different in different browser. Please select a corresponding browser. Note: This setting will be overlapped if scheduled switching setting is on.
Setting.NotSupportIncrementalAcquisition: Incremental Extraction Settings (Not Available for Current Task)
Setting.FollowTask: 1. You don’t need to configure another task to extract new data. 2. This option is only available in the Cloud Extraction. 3. Updated data is identified by new URLs that are generated by new pages. 4. Incremental Extraction is available only when there is one "Extract Data" step in the workflow. 5. This feature doesn’t support AJAX website.
Setting.UrlHasNoParameters: 该URL没有可供选择的参数
Setting.UrlAndFollowingParameters: Identified by part of URL (Select URL parameters)
Setting.CloudCollectionEmail: 云采集邮件通知使用情况：
Setting.EmailNotificationComplete: Enable email notifications when Cloud Extraction is completed.
Setting.SwitchBrowserVersionRegularly: Auto switch between different web browsers
